update.description:
# New feature

1. Open a world which contains nested models, such as `test/worlds/deeply_nested_models.world`

2. Right-click the model and choose Edit Model.

3. All nested models will appear in the model editor's 3D scene and their names will be nested in the palette under `Nested Models`.

4. Exit and save the model, the saved model contains all nested models in the proper poses.

# Notes

1. Links within nested models can be seen in the 3D scene but they don't show up on the list.

2. All joints declared in the top level are shown, even if they connect deeply nested links. Conversely, if joints connecting top level links are declared within lower layers, they won't show.

# Future pull requests

1. Select and manipulate nested models

2. Delete nested models

3. Nested model context menu and inspector

4. Copy / paste nested models

5. Nested models in the schematic view
update.title: Model Editor: Load and save nested models

content.raw:
[no gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/659/) nested model test failed probably because it needs sdformat [pull request #221](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/221/nested-sdf-sdf3/diff)

[gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/501/) same as above

[homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/511/) `ModelEditorPalette_TEST.LoadNestedModel` failed, issue fixed -- [new build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/525/) ok

[coverage](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20coverage%20jobs/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/364/) model editor tests don't run...
content.html:
no gpu nested model test failed probably because it needs sdformat pull request #221

gpu same as above

homebrew ModelEditorPalette_TEST.LoadNestedModel failed, issue fixed -- new build ok

coverage model editor tests don't run...

pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Load and save nested models

content.raw: Since pull request #1887 has been merged, inspectors for joints between nested models won't work well. Try `joint_02` from `test/worlds/deeply_nested_models.world` for example. This will be dealt with in future pull requests.
content.html: Since pull request #1887 has been merged, inspectors for joints between nested models won't work well. Try joint_02 from test/worlds/deeply_nested_models.world for example. This will be dealt with in future pull requests.
